meaningMnemonic: Unlike the 警視庁, who look at things, this is just the <kanji>police officer</kanji> (警察) <kanji>agency</kanji>. Just the general police agency of the whole country, making them part of the <vocabulary>National Police Agency</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
